title: mzPeak metadata data processing method list
description: Describe the JSON format of data processing method list

data_processing_method.description: Describes a single instrument configuration that was used. Analogous to https://peptideatlas.org/tmp/mzML1.1.0.html#dataProcessingList

id.description: A unique identifier for the data processing method.

processing_method.description: Describes a single step of data processing.

order.description: The order in which the step is applied in the data processing pipeline.

software_reference.description: The identifier for a software entry that performed this operation.

parameters.description: Additional parameters describing this data processing step denoting actions, parameters, and other descriptors.
